doc.title: The Wedding
doc.plot: The Wedding follows the story of three different people who are about to attend a wedding, all of which have different reasons for not wanting to be there. The flower girl Caitlin is to old to be a flower girl and is missing her soccer game. The priest has gotten drunk and lost his faith in God and marriage. The groom slept with a stripper named Candy at his bachelor party and thinks he has fallen in love with her.
